item.title: Privacy
item.description: Privacy Policy for https://alexk2037.github.io/ At Step by Step Dev, accessible from https://alexk2037.github.io/, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by Step by Step Dev and how we use it. If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us. This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in Step by Step Dev.
